meanings.definition: A lightweight solid material derived from a gel in which the liquid component has been replaced with a gas.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the aerogel under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The aerogel floated effortlessly in the air due to its low density.
meanings.sent3: The aerogel felt like holding a cloud in your hand.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an aerogel, filled with thoughts floating freely.
meanings.sent5: The aerogel resembled a delicate sponge, but made of air instead of water.
